latex:
Let
$$n = \sin \frac{\pi}{6} \cos \frac{\pi}{12} - \cos \frac{\pi}{6} \left(\sin \frac{\pi}{6} \cos \frac{\pi}{12} - \cos \frac{\pi}{6} \left(\sin \frac{\pi}{6} \cos \frac{\pi}{12} - \sin \frac{\pi}{12} \cos \frac{\pi}{6}\right)\right). $$
\bigskip The value of $n$ can be expressed as $\frac{\sqrt{a} - \sqrt{b}}{c}.$ What is $a+2b+3c?$
